hero.title: Grow Your Business with Digital Loyalty Cards!
hero.subtitle: Stand out and attract visitors to convert them into loyal customers using mobile-compatible loyalty cards that can be saved in Apple Wallet and Google Wallet. Plus, custom phone notifications to keep your customers engaged without needing to download any app.

mobileCompatible.title: Mobile Compatible
mobileCompatible.description: Cards are saved in customers' mobile wallets (Apple and Android) for easy access, allowing you to earn and redeem rewards from stores without needing a paper card.

realTimeUpdates.title: Real-time Card Updates
realTimeUpdates.description: Digital loyalty cards are updated in real-time to reflect changes in offers, point balances, program details, redemption status, and more.

easySetup.title: Easy Setup
easySetup.description: Create and customize digital loyalty cards for your store in minutes

varietyCards.title: Variety of Card Types
varietyCards.description: Choose from stamp cards, discounts, vouchers, and more

analytics.title: Know Your Customers Better
analytics.description: Track your customers' behavior and preferences using our analytics tools

notifications.title: Mobile Push Notifications
notifications.description: Send custom notifications to your customers' phones without needing to download any app

footer.description: Grow your business with digital loyalty cards! Stand out and attract visitors to convert them into loyal customers.

blog.title: Bookk Blog
blog.subtitle: Discover the latest articles and tips in the world of development and technology
blog.author: Author

newsletter.title: Stay Updated
newsletter.subtitle: Subscribe to our newsletter to receive the latest articles and technical tips

howItWorks.subtitle: How It Works
howItWorks.title: How Does the Card Work?
howItWorks.step1Description: Point your phone camera at the barcode located on the store's cashier.
howItWorks.step3Description: Load your card to your phone wallet in Apple Pay or Google Pay

customerRetention.title: Customer Retention
customerRetention.description: Make your customers come back consistently through easy-to-use rewards

increaseSales.title: Increase Sales
increaseSales.description: Encourage repeat visits and increased spending through targeted offers

improveExperience.title: Improve Customer Experience
improveExperience.description: Provide a modern and convenient way for customers to earn and redeem rewards

saveTimeMoney.title: Save Time and Money
saveTimeMoney.description: Reduce the complexity of managing physical cards and simplify your loyalty program

directCommunication.title: Direct Communication
directCommunication.description: Communicate with your customers instantly via phone notifications for special offers and updates without an app

pricing.title: Affordable Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Get our features at affordable prices. Our plans are designed specifically to provide unmatched value.

items.dedicatedSuccess: Dedicated success manager for faster activation

stamps.title: Stamps
stamps.name: Stamp Card
stamps.description: The stamp card contains a number of stamps determined by the business owner, and the customer collects these stamps on each visit or as determined by the business owner. When the stamps are completed, the customer receives a reward that they can redeem on their next visit.

points.title: Points
points.name: Points Card
points.description: The points card collects points for every riyal spent, as determined by the business owner. Points can be awarded on each visit or as determined by the business owner. The business owner can add multiple types of rewards at different point levels, and when the customer reaches any of these levels, they receive a reward that they can use on their next visit.

cashback.title: Cashback
cashback.name: Cashback Card
cashback.description: The cashback card allows the business owner to set a reward percentage rate on each purchase. Customers receive a balance that they can use in future orders. It also allows them to set the number of days for balance validity, after which expired transactions are excluded from the available balance.

subscription.title: Subscription
subscription.name: Subscription Card
subscription.description: The subscription card enables the business owner to create packages for healthy food or services in general, with a specific number of uses and a specific time period. The customer presents the card to benefit from the subscription on each visit.

discount.title: Discount
discount.name: Discount Card
discount.description: This card allows you to set a discount percentage or a fixed discount amount. The system manages it where you can set the number of daily uses, set its expiration date, and the number of customers allowed to download it.

gift.title: Gift Card
gift.name: Prepaid Card
gift.description: A prepaid card is a card that carries a specific amount that the customer can purchase or gift. The cardholder can benefit from the balance on their future visits.

membership.title: Membership Card
membership.name: Membership Card
membership.description: The membership card is a card that carries the membership holder's data, and the system records visits or uses of the membership holder on each visit. It can be used to verify the person's identity or to manage memberships.

industries.subtitle: Learn About Categories
industries.title: Who Do We Target?
industries.contactButton: Contact us to learn how we can serve your business

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.subtitle: At Bookk, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal data. Learn about how we collect, use, and protect your information.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content:
Welcome to Bookk. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our services.

By using our services, you agree to the privacy practices described in this policy. If you do not agree with this policy, please do not use our services.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content:
We collect different types of information to improve our services and provide you with a better experience:

• Personal Information: Name, email address, phone number
• Account Information: Login credentials and user preferences
• Usage Information: How you interact with our services
• Device Information: Device type, operating system, and browser
• Location Information: Geographic location when needed for specific services

dataUsage.title: Data Usage
dataUsage.content:
We use the information we collect for the following purposes:

• Providing and improving our services
• Communicating with you about service updates
• Personalizing your experience with our platform
• Analyzing usage to improve performance
• Ensuring security and preventing fraud
• Complying with legal requirements

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.content:
We use advanced security measures to protect your information:

• Data encryption during transmission and storage
• Restricted access to sensitive information
• Continuous system monitoring
• Employee training on security best practices
• Regular security updates
• Secure data backups

userRights.title: User Rights
userRights.content:
You have the following rights regarding your personal data:

• Access to your personal information
• Correction of inaccurate information
• Deletion of your personal data
• Restriction of data processing
• Data portability to another service
• Objection to data processing
• Withdrawal of consent at any time

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content:
If you have any questions about this privacy policy or our practices, please contact us:

Email: privacy@bookk.com
Phone: +249 111 638 872
Address: Khartoum, Sudan

We will respond to your inquiries as soon as possible.

cta.title: Do you have questions about privacy?
cta.subtitle: Our team is available to answer any questions about protecting your data and privacy

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.subtitle: These terms and conditions govern your use of Bookk services. Please read them carefully before using our services.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content:
By using Bookk services, you agree to comply with these terms and conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use our services.

We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. You will be notified of any significant changes via email or through our platform.

userAccounts.title: User Accounts
userAccounts.content:
To benefit from our services, you may need to create an account. You are responsible for:

• Maintaining the confidentiality of your login information
• Providing accurate and up-to-date information
• Immediately reporting any unauthorized use
• Not sharing your account with others
• Complying with all applicable laws
• Not creating multiple accounts

acceptableUse.title: Acceptable Use
acceptableUse.content:
When using our services, you must:

• Use services for legal purposes only
• Respect others' intellectual property rights
• Not attempt to hack or disable our systems
• Not send harmful or illegal content
• Respect other users' privacy
• Not use services for unauthorized commercial purposes

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content:
All content and services provided by Bookk are protected by copyright and intellectual property rights:

• We retain all rights to our platform and services
• Bookk content may not be copied or distributed without permission
• You may use our services for personal purposes only
• Any content you share remains yours
• We are responsible for the content you share

liability.title: Liability and Warranties
liability.content:
We provide our services "as is" without express or implied warranties:

• We do not guarantee uninterrupted service
• We are not liable for indirect damages
• We are liable only within the limits allowed by law
• You must keep backup copies of your data
• We have limited liability for any damages

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content:
If you have any questions about these terms of service, please contact us:

Email: legal@bookk.com
Phone: +249 111 638 872
Address: Khartoum, Sudan

We will respond to your inquiries as soon as possible.

importantNotice.title: Important Notice
importantNotice.content:
These terms and conditions constitute a legal agreement between you and Bookk. Please read them carefully and keep a copy.

In case of any dispute, the laws of the Republic of Sudan will apply. Any disputes will be resolved through the competent courts in Khartoum.

cta.title: Do you have questions about terms of service?
cta.subtitle: Our legal team is available to answer any questions about the terms and conditions of using our services

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.subtitle: We use cookies to improve your experience with our platform. Learn about how we use these technologies.

whatAreCookies.title: What are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.content:
Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit our website:

• Help us remember your preferences
• Improve website performance and loading speed
• Enable us to provide personalized content
• Help analyze how the website is used
• Improve the overall browsing experience

typesOfCookies.title: Types of Cookies
typesOfCookies.content:
We use different types of cookies:

• Essential Cookies: Necessary for website functionality
• Functional Cookies: Improve functionality
• Analytical Cookies: Help understand usage
• Marketing Cookies: Provide personalized ads
• Third-party Cookies: From external services

howWeUseCookies.title: How We Use Cookies
howWeUseCookies.content:
We use cookies for the following purposes:

• Remembering language and location preferences
• Improving website performance and loading speed
• Analyzing how the website is used
• Providing personalized content and ads
• Ensuring website security
• Improving user experience

cookieManagement.title: Cookie Management
cookieManagement.content:
You can control cookies in several ways:

• Through browser settings
• Using cookie management tools
• Through privacy settings in your account
• By deleting existing cookies
• By preventing storage of new cookies

thirdPartyCookies.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdPartyCookies.content:
We may use third-party services that use cookies:

• Analytics services like Google Analytics
• Social media platforms
• Advertising services
• Payment services
• Maps and location services

These services have separate privacy policies.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content:
If you have any questions about our cookie policy, please contact us:

Email: privacy@bookk.com
Phone: +249 111 638 872
Address: Khartoum, Sudan

We will respond to your inquiries as soon as possible.

settings.title: Cookie Settings
settings.content:
You can customize your cookie preferences. Choose what you want to accept:

• Essential Cookies (required)
• Functional Cookies
• Analytical Cookies
• Marketing Cookies

cta.title: Do you have questions about cookies?
cta.subtitle: Our team is available to answer any questions about our use of cookies

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password?

forgotPassword.checkEmailSubtitle: Check your email to complete the password reset process
forgotPassword.checkPhoneSubtitle: Check your text messages to complete the password reset process
forgotPassword.emailSentMessage: Password reset link has been sent to {{email}}
forgotPassword.phoneSentMessage: Password reset code has been sent to {{phone}}
forgotPassword.emailInstruction1: Check your spam folder if you don't see the email
forgotPassword.emailInstruction2: The link is valid for 24 hours only
forgotPassword.emailInstruction3: If you don't receive the email, verify your email address
forgotPassword.phoneInstruction1: Check your text messages and spam folder
forgotPassword.phoneInstruction2: The code is valid for 10 minutes only
forgotPassword.phoneInstruction3: If you don't receive the message, verify your phone number
forgotPassword.emailInfoMessage: We'll send you a secure link to reset your password via email
forgotPassword.phoneInfoMessage: We'll send you a secure verification code via SMS to reset your password
forgotPassword.emailSuccessMessage: Password reset link sent via email successfully!
forgotPassword.phoneSuccessMessage: Password reset code sent via SMS successfully!
forgotPassword.errorMessage: Failed to send recovery request. Please check your information and try again.
